text.ウマ娘にはそれぞれ異なった目標があります。\\n今回はこの目標を達成しましょう！: Each of the Uma Musume has a different goal.\nLet's now realize these goals!
text.こちらは育成を進めていくうえでの\\nコマンドです。: These are the commands to proceed with training.
text.コマンドを1つ実行すると、\\nターンを消費します。: Executing a single command consumes a turn.
text.こちらがトレーニングの種類です！\\nそれぞれ成長させられる能力が異なります。: Here are the different types of training!\nEach one develops different abilities.
text.次に、育成ウマ娘の体力について\\nご説明いたしますね。: Next, I would like to explain the energy of the Uma Musu you are training.
text.まずは先程と同じく、\\nトレーニングを選んでみましょう。: First, as before, let's choose a training.
text.こちらの『失敗率』にご注目ください。: Please pay attention to the "failure rate" here.
text.残り体力が少ないほど、\\n失敗率は高くなってしまいます。: The less energy you have left, the higher the failure rate will be.
text.トレーニングに失敗すると、能力ややる気が\\n下がってしまいますので、ご注意くだ: Failing a training will reduce ability and motivation so be careful…!
text.では、1度戻ってみましょう。: Now, let's go back one step.
text.体力が減っている時には、ウマ娘を\\nお休みさせて、体力を回復しましょう。: When you are low on energy, let your Uma Musu take a break to recover her strength.
text.次に、覚えるスキルを選んでください。\\n先程のスキルポイントを使用します！: Next, choose a skill to learn.\nWe'll use the skill points you just earned!
text.今回は、こちらのスキルを習得しましょう。: This time, let's learn this skill.
text.これで準備は整いました！\\nレースに出走しましょう！: And we're all set!\nLet's enter a race!
text.出走できるレースがある場合、\\nリストに表示されますよ。: If there is a race that you can run, it will show up in the list.
text.今回は、こちらのレースに出走しましょう！: This time, let's run this race!
text.パドックでは、レースに出走するウマ娘の\\n能力や人気などが確認できますよ！: In the paddock, you can check the abilities and popularity of the Uma Musu running in the race!
text.まずは予想印について説明しますね。印は、『◎』\\n『○』『▲』『△』の順で高い: First of all, I'll explain the prediction marks. The "◎", "○", "▲", and "△" marks indicate ratings in that order, from highest.
text.能力ややる気が高ければ高いほど期待が集まり、\\nウマ娘の人気は高くなりやすいで: The higher the ability and motivation, the higher the expectations, and the more popular the Uma Musume is likely to be.
text.もちろん、必ず勝てるというわけではありませんが、\\nやはり人気が高いほど良い結: Of course, there's no guarantee of winning, but generally the more popular you are, the better results you can expect!
text.また、パドックではウマ娘の作戦を\\n変更することもできますよ。: You can also change the strategy of your Uma Musu in the paddock.
text.作戦は、ウマ娘の得意なものを\\n選ぶとよいでしょう。: Of course choosing a strategy your Uma Musu is strong at is a good idea.
text.これで準備は整いました！\\nさあ、いよいよレース出走です！！: We're all set now!\nIt's time to run the race!
text.スキルポイントが残っている場合は、\\n使い忘れにご注意くださいね。: If you have any skill points left, please don't forget to use them.
text.では、これで育成完了です！: Well then, that's it for training!
text.育成完了したウマ娘は、一定の基準で評価されたのち\\n『殿堂入りウマ娘』として登: Once an Uma Musu has been trained, she will be evaluated based on certain criteria and then registered as a "Hall of Fame" horse girl.
text.最高ランクを目指してがんばってください！: Good luck in your quest for the highest rank!
text.育成が完了したウマ娘は\\n『因子』を獲得することがあります。: Once the training is complete, the horse girl may acquire a "factor".
text.継承ウマ娘として選ぶことで、新たなウマ娘への\\n想いを繋ぎ、こちらの『因子』を: By selecting an Uma Musu as inherited Uma Musu, she will transfer feelings to your new Uma Musu and pass on these "factors"!
text.がんばったウマ娘のことを\\nめいっぱい褒めてあげましょう！: Let's give all the praise we can to the Uma Musume for her hard work!
text.レース後、本来ウイニングライブが行われるのですが\\n今回は研修中なので、割愛さ: After the race there is supposed to be a winning live performance, but since we're in the middle of your introduction I'll skip it.
text.なお、研修は短かったですが、\\n本来の育成期間は『3年間』です。: Although it was short in this introduction, the actual training period is 3 years.
text.担当ウマ娘との日々を、\\n大切に過ごしてくださいね！: Please cherish the days spent with the Uma Musume in your charge!
text.3つの印は専門家たちの予想を示し、\\n人気はファンの方たちみんなの予想になりま: The three marks indicate the predictions of the experts, and the popularity is the prediction of all the fans.
